name: A Fuse Cannon
description:
This is an entry for the Brackey's Game Jame 2021.1. The theme was stronger together, so I decided to lay the game upon the factor of FUSION. 

Fuse with enemies you come across and collect the shards to save everyone from the approaching meteor.

W/A/S/D or ARROW KEYS to move and jump.

POINT and CLICK to shoot gun.

R to unfuse.

(Btw I messed up the code and the game starts at Level 4. Head to the levels screen and click Level 0 to start at the VERY start.)
